detectors.description: Variable MinionFInance._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MinionFInance.sol#39) is not in mixedCase

	- _totalSupply = 700000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MinionFInance.sol#53)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- MinionFInance.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MinionFInance.sol#59-61)
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MinionFInance.sol#8)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- MinionFInance.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MinionFInance.sol#63-65)
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MinionFInance.sol#9)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- MinionFInance.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MinionFInance.sol#67-69)
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MinionFInance.sol#10)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MinionFInance.sol#11)
	- MinionFInance.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MinionFInance.sol#77-82)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- MinionFInance.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MinionFInance.sol#71-75)
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MinionFInance.sol#12)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MinionFInance.sol#28)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MinionFInance.sol#28-30)
